table.name: civicrm_file
table.comment: Data store for uploaded (attached) files (pointer to file on disk OR blob). Maybe be joined to entities via custom_value.file_id or entity_file table.

field.name: file_type_id
field.title: File Type
field.comment: Type of file (e.g. Transcript, Income Tax Return, etc). FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: uri
field.title: Path
field.comment: uri of the file on disk

field.name: description
field.title: File Description
field.comment: Additional descriptive text regarding this attachment (optional).

field.name: upload_date
field.title: File Upload Date
field.comment: Date and time that this attachment was uploaded or written to server.

field.name: created_id
field.title: Created By Contact ID
field.comment: FK to civicrm_contact, who uploaded this file
